content:
CGs as Work Practice Simulators

  • Support shared awareness, communication, tool use, resourcing, community, etc.

  • Agent-based characters and roles

  • Scripting-based skills, game play (“work”)

  • Reactive and proactive behavior

  • Open and extensible environment

  • Large, diverse community of practice in place (> 100 Web sites for Unreal).
